title: Kloudfuse 3.0: an All-in-One Observability Platform Emerges
author: B Cameron Gain
description: The startup rolled out its latest version at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon this week, setting up a challenge to the dominance of Datadog, Grafana and other platforms.
cntitle: Kloudfuse 3.0：一体化可观测性平台诞生
cndescription: 这家初创公司本周在 KubeCon + CloudNativeCon 发布了其最新版本，对 Datadog、Grafana 等平台的统治地位提出了挑战。
